content.question: Find the x-coordinate of the critical point of f. Determine whether this point is a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither for the function f. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of the critical point of f. Determine whether this point is a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither for the function f. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema
